Posts.Content: Mine is aqua, it reminds me of the beautiful shades of the ocean in hawaii.
Posts.Title: I thought it would be great to see what your favorite color is, so, what is your favorite color?

Posts.Content: Hi, I've had lumpectomy, radiation, mastectomy, tamoxifen for 2 1/2 years, now switching to Aromisin. I had more side affects with tamoxifen - bone and joint aches, hot flashes. Aromisin doesn't seem to bother me as much. Still have hot flashes, but not as bad. Hope it works out for you.
Posts.Title: Aromasin after Chemo and Radiation

Posts.Content: I also wake up 2-3 times per night, I've been taking a melatonin (3 mg) and a generic sleep aid (walmart) that has the same ingredients as unisom, it's works well, I sleep right thru the night. Give it a try.
Posts.Title: Up all Night
